title: 19. SEVERABILITY
content: If any term or condition of this Agreement shall be held invalid in any respect by any court or governmental agency of competent jurisdiction and all appeals have been exhausted, the Parties shall use commercially reasonable efforts to agree on either: (a) an amendment which would restore the validity of the term or condition or (b) a comparable, valid term or condition. If no such agreement can be reached, the other valid provisions of this Agreement are severable and remain in effect.
